item.description:
Inner Peace Festival and Open House
May 22, 2010
85 Edgell Road (Otis Boynton House on the Framingham Common)

We are the Center of Light. Our mission is to support inner peace and world peace. We offer our annual Inner Peace Festival to the Framingham community as a way to get to know us and to enjoy an afternoon of peacemaking. We invite you to join us for any or all of the following activities and to see our newly transformed space.

2-5 pm Adult and Family Activities: oragami flower, heart and peace dove activities for world peace; face painting; Gandhi peace video; indoor displays and guided meditations;refreshments

6-9 pm Adult Evening Activities: Guided Meditation for World Peace; refreshments; Conscious movie viewing of 'Baraka'.

All events and activities are free. We invite you to bring your friends and family for an uplifting event that offers a way for everyone to be involved in making peace.
item.name: Inner Peace Festival
